attributes.action: put the interests of his voting public first and foremost and to where possible reinforce his previous message of British jobs for British people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is not about foreign workers, after all we British have enjoyed employment in Europe and around the world for years. It is about, once again, a government failing to support it's people in their hour of need.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
